title: Ndlela Leyi Yi Tirhaka Ha Yona - Orbital Temple
heading: Ndlela Leyi Swi Tirhaka Ha Yona
intro: Phurojeke ya Orbital Temple yi na swiaki swinharhu leswi hlanganisiweke leswi tirhaka swinâ€™we ku rhumela mavito etempeleni exibakabakeni.
paragraph1: Sathelayiti leyi yi rhendzeleka na Misava eka vukulu bya kwalomu ka 525 km, yi hlayisa mavito lawa eka miehleketo ya yona. Switichi swa le hansi swi vulavurisana na sathelayiti hi nkarhi wa ku hundza ka yona, swi hundzisela mavito lawa vanhu va ma rhumeleke hi ku tirhisa webusayiti.
paragraph2: Loko u rhumela vito, ri joyina layini naswona ri ta hundziseriwa eka sathelayiti hi nkarhi wa ku hundza loku landzelaka loku kumekaka. U ta kuma xitiyisekiso xa email loko vito ra wena ri layichiwile hi ndlela leyi humelelaka eka Orbital Temple.
imageAlt: Xifaniso xa Sisiteme ya Tempele ya Orbital
